data.text: And Questlove and my wife had been friends for 20 years.

translation.text: Và Questlove và vợ tôi đã là bạn trong 20 năm.

data.text: And when we announced we were getting married,

data.text: So Questlove deejayed our wedding.

data.text: who is contacted by his daughter's imaginary friend
